entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -30.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -30.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -34.3°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
